attributes.action: Longer & stronger sentences for perpetrators of domestic violence.
attributes.additional_details:
I melody moon previously went through domestic violence by my ex partner and nearly died & he got 2 years surspended sentance. 
Too many people can't get justice due to our justice system. 
We need to do more to help our victims, get them justice we deserve & help stop future domestic violence
attributes.background: domestic violence sentencing is too short or none at all. That leaves the victims With no justice or can't move on. Why should they have to suffer? Please help sign & help victims get their justice or even help stop domestic violence. Thankyou

rejection.details: Sentences in specific cases are the responsibility of the courts, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to set specific minimum sentences for people convicted of domestic violence offences.
